topic: 4. Which of these activities is not one of the activities recommended to be performed by an independent SQA group?
options: prepare SQA plan for the project
review software engineering activities to verify process compliance
report any evidence of noncompliance to senior management
serve as the sole test team for any software produced
topic_cn: 4. 以下哪项活动不是独立SQA小组建议执行的活动？
options_cn: 审查软件工程活动以验证过程合规性
向高级管理层报告任何不合规的证据
作为所开发软件的唯一测试团队
